quote.author: Atticus

scripture.text: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork. He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.

Maybe it's because this world still gets to have you in it... A soul so full of light, warmth, and purposeâ€¦ you're not just a blessing to me and Everyone Else youâ€™re a gift from Heaven itself. ðŸ’›

I need you to know That You're important. Not just to me, but to God. He created the stars and gave them all names, but even they donâ€™t shine the way you do... Your presence brings peace. Your laughter makes the world softer. And your strength? It gives people like me hope.

You're not just admiredâ€¦ you're treasured. You're not just beautifulâ€¦ you're meaningful. And in this crazy, noisy world, your soul still whispers kindness, love, and purpose.

So on days when the world feels loud, remember this: you're the reason the light keeps showing up. You're the miracle in someoneâ€™s prayer. You're the answer.
